edu.uncc.cs.bridges

Class Bridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uncc.cs.bridges.Bridge

  • public class Bridge
extends java.lang.Object
    Connection to the Bridges server. Initialize this class before using it, and call complete() afterward.

      • update

        public static void update()
        Update visualization metadata. This may be called many times. This is usually an expensive operation and involves connecting to the network. Calling this method is optional provided you call complete()

      • complete

        public static void complete()
        Close down Bridges. This only calls update() but it could conceivably do more.

        public static java.util.List<Tweet> next(java.util.List<Tweet> aList,
                         int max)
        The next(List, int) method retrieves the next batch of tweets and adds deep copy of those tweets to the current list
        Parameters:
